title: Taishou Itsuwari Bridal: Migawari Hanayome to Gunpuku no Mouai

alternative_titles.en: Taisho Era Contract Marriage: The Substitute Bride and a Soldier's Fierce Love
alternative_titles.ja: 大正偽りブラヰダル 身代わり花嫁と軍服の猛愛

synopsis:
Asako, despite her status as a viscount's daughter, is shunned in high society. One day, a marriage proposal arrives for her younger sister with Captain Kido, a renowned soldier known for his ice-cold demeanor. Rumor says he seeks a bride solely for the purpose of bearing children... To protect her precious younger sister, Asako volunteers as a substitute bride.

(Source: TVDB)
